original_title: รักเธอให้น้อยลง
overview: In Matung Radapdao's short film to start off her music video 'Ruk Tur Hai Noy Long', Fern has dated her best friend Gun for a while and was ready to confess her feelings for him on his birthday. As she tries to give him his present, he breaks up with her and moves on to someone new.
tagline: Trying to forget someone makes you remember them even more.
title: Ruk Tur Hai Noy Long
